flavorText: "You may even see them again. Full digestion takes three hundred years."
name: Into the Earthen Maw
originalText: When you set this scheme in motion, exile up to one target creature with flying, up to one target creature without flying, and all cards from up to one target opponent's graveyard.

rulings.text: You may choose zero, one, two, or three targets.

text: When you set this scheme in motion, exile up to one target creature with flying, up to one target creature without flying, and all cards from up to one target opponent's graveyard.
